analysis.description:
Minter.transferRestTokensToOwner (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#359-366) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(token,msg.sender,token.allowance(token,this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#362-366)

Minter.fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#366-393) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(token,msg.sender,tokensNumber) (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#387-389)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#20-22): it allows old versions
Parameter '_name' of ABXToken.ABXToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_symbol' of ABXToken.ABXToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#118) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_decimals' of ABXToken.ABXToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#118-119) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_totalSupply' of ABXToken.ABXToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#120) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of ABXToken.setOwner (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#134) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minter' of ABXToken.setMinter (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#139) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_manager' of Minter.Minter (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#309-310) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of Minter.Minter (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#310) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of Minter.setOwner (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#327-328) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_manager' of Minter.setManager (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#331) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_paused' of Minter.setPaused (/unique_chucks/2/0x903a61bc9ff163138959f9f7b00f4b00ca0f3210.sol#335) is not in mixedCase
